About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

Hi, I’m Reza Darooei — a passionate game developer and PhD candidate in Biomedical Engineering at Isfahan University of Medical Sciences. I lead the Game and Treatment Lab, where we explore the intersection of interactive technology, neuroscience, and therapy.

With a strong foundation in signal processing and pattern recognition, I have expanded into machine learning and deep learning, applying these techniques in both academic research and real-world development. You can check out my recent publications on my Google Scholar.

I thrive on solving complex problems, pushing creative boundaries, and constantly learning new technologies. This curiosity led me to master game engines like Unity and Unreal Engine, as well as full-stack web development.

Whether it’s therapeutic games, AI models, or interactive web platforms, I’m driven to make meaningful and innovative contributions. Feel free to visit the Work section to see my latest projects or contact me anytime!
